message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still not able to meet at $13,000. Would you consider $12,500 for the product?
